message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to account for the higher inflation I face.
Alice, your rate of inflation is high, so we need to settle this quickly.  I'm willing to take a bit less than I think is fair to end this now.  70/30.
Bob, this is my final offer. Accepting now is better for both of us than dragging this out further and losing more to inflation.
